title: Career | Phoenix Technologies
meta_description: Join our innovative team and shape the future of cloud and AI technology. Explore exciting career opportunities and grow with us.

headings.text: Experience the Swiss way to Cloud and AI
We Make AI Work For You

main_content: Experience the Swiss way to Cloud and AI At Phoenix Technologies we are delivering sovereign, high-performance computing solutions designed for enterprises requiring scalability, security, and data sovereignty. Driven by state-of-the-art automation and rooted in proven best practices, we promise you availability and unmatched scalability. With the courage to push boundaries, we redefine the possibilities of technology, delivering innovative solutions that drive your success. Our Community We challenge the status quo, creating an inclusive environment where everyone, regardless of background, can succeed and drive our mission forward. Life at Phoenix We live in open communication and a collaborative working environment. By promoting a safe, innovative, and inclusive culture, anyone with the talent, energy and focus will be heard. Open Roles Explore exciting career opportunities with us on LinkedIn , where we regularly post our open roles. Follow our page to stay updated on the latest job openings and join our growing team! Roles at Phoenix Technologies Download  (undefined, 0 B) If you have any other questions, please let us know!
